features.name: Product Catalog
features.description: E-commerce product listing with filtering, search, categories, and detailed product pages. Includes image gallery with hover preview and mobile swipe.

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Cart management with add/remove products, quantity adjustment, total calculation, and WhatsApp checkout integration. Includes payment method selection (Pix/Card) with 5% Pix discount.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Administrative panel for managing products, orders, blog posts, and store settings. Includes authentication, product CRUD, inventory management, and order tracking.

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with Supabase Auth. Login flow with role-based access (admin). Persistent session management.

features.name: Blog System
features.description: Content management system for blog posts with featured posts, categories, publish/draft status, and detail pages.

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Dark/Light mode toggle with persistent theme preference using localStorage.

features.name: Store Configuration
features.description: Global store settings management including store name, logo, WhatsApp number, and hero section customization.

features.name: Supabase API Layer
features.description: Backend integration with Supabase for products, orders, blog posts, and settings. Includes localStorage fallback for offline development.

features.name: AI Integration (Gemini)
features.description: Google Gemini AI integration for product descriptions and content generation (admin feature).

features.name: Layout & Navigation
features.description: Main layout component with responsive header, navigation menu, footer, user menu, shopping cart indicator, and search functionality.

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Payment method selection (Pix/Credit Card) with automatic Pix discount calculation. WhatsApp-based checkout flow.

features.name: Product Image Gallery
features.description: Multi-image product gallery with desktop hover carousel and mobile swipe navigation.

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions for className merging (cn) and other utilities.
